system.description: You have achieved absolute mastery in a particular skill, able to perform extraordinary feats through sheer expertise.
system.benefit: Character can spend an Infamy/Fate Point to automatically Pass a Skill Test with chosen skill by a number of Degrees of Success equal to Characteristic Bonus of the skill's associated characteristic, provided the final modifier of the skill Test is +0 or better. This Talent can be taken multiple times, each time for a different skill that meets the talent's requirements. Takes the format of, for example: Mastery(Intimidate), Mastery(Tech-Use)
system.notes: Specialization should specify the skill mastered (e.g., 'Tech-Use', 'Intimidate')

specialAbilities.name: Fate-Fueled Expertise
specialAbilities.description: You can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass a test with the chosen skill by a number of Degrees of Success equal to the skill's associated Characteristic Bonus, provided the final modifier of the skill test is +0 or better.
